projects.name: Portfolio
projects.description: Open source portfolio website. The one you are currently browsing. Built using next.js, Tailwind and DiasyUI.

about.header: A fullstack developer from Stockholm, Sweden.
about.paragraph: Hi, my name is Adrian Karlén and I am a {{age}} software developer based in Stockholm. My main focus is web development and I have previous work experience with technologies such as React, PHP, JS/TS and .NET. My everyday work have consisted of developing web-based business systems, e-commerce systems and customer portals. This have also included integration with external systems. I am currently working as a consultant at {{company}}.
